Html:
• Downloaded the latest source, opened the .sln and built it with with vs2010. Installed bin\Chirp.vsi. 
  • Tools -> Options -> Chirp -> dynamic CSS -> Syntax highlighting  is checked
  • Opened an existing MVC test project, created Less1.chirp.less
  • There is no syntax highlighting. 

 

Mindscape Web Workbench is uninstalled (orignally had it, but uninstalled it and re-installed Chirpy, but that didn't fix it). When I tried with both installed Chirp wasn't auto updating the .css code behinds when i saved the .chirp.less files.
I  can confirm the exact same scenario and problem (crazy coincidence, that is).
Update: I just went ahead and purchased the Pro version of Mindscape Workbench and disabled Chirp.
